meanings.definition: To go away from a place
meanings.sent1: She is leaving for school now.
meanings.sent2: He will be leaving work early today.
meanings.sent3: The cat is leaving the room, probably to chase a mouse.
meanings.sent4: The sun is leaving the sky, painting it with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The train leaving the station is a symbol of new beginnings.

meanings.definition: The act of departing from a place
meanings.sent1: His leaving was sudden and unexpected.
meanings.sent2: The leaving of the ship signaled the end of the journey.
meanings.sent3: The leaving of the party guests left the host feeling lonely.
meanings.sent4: The leaving of autumn brought the arrival of winter.
meanings.sent5: The leaving of the old year and the coming of the new filled everyone with hope.
